name: Final Duel
description:
Final Duel is a 2 Players only fighting game done in 24 hours as a personal challenge: What kind of game can I make alone in just one day? The result is this mute simple dueling game, that can be played with a friend just with WASD and the arrow keys. 

En Garde!

INSTRUCTIONS

Just click on "Final Duel.exe" to play.

ESCAPE: Exit Final Duel

This is a 2 player only game!

PLAYER 1

UP: Move upwards
DOWN: Move downwards
RIGHT: Defense
LEFT: Attack

PLAYER 2

W: Move upwards
S: Move downwards
D: Defense
A: Attack

First player to hit its rival wins! The Queen will point out the winner.

Everytime an attack is blocked, your character moves closer and closer to the edge of the dueling platform. Get too close to the border, and you will end up in the lava pit!
